Module Contents

.. py:function:: load_config(path)

   
   Return load config.

   :param path: Description for ``path``.
   :type path: str

   :returns: *Mapping[str, Any]* -- Description of return value.

   .. rubric:: Examples

   >>> from kgfoundry_common.config import load_config
   >>> result = load_config(...)
   >>> result  # doctest: +ELLIPSIS
   ...
